H0.text: The Art Nouveau designer Rene Lalique most famously worked in which material. Copper

H1.text: The Art Nouveau designer Rene Lalique most famously worked in which material. Marble

H2.text: The Art Nouveau designer Rene Lalique most famously worked in which material. Wood

H3.text: The Art Nouveau designer Rene Lalique most famously worked in which material. Glass

A4.text: He was best known for his creations in glass art.

A5.text: Lalique was also a pioneer in the use of 'p√¢te-de-verre,' an ancient glassworking technique, which he used to mold ground glass into intricate, lifelike forms in both jewelry and decorative objects.
